name: Go To Earth
description:
It is my first game released online, I made it alone during the epic megajam 2019.

I hope that you will enjoy my game !

Overview of the game :

- Survive to the madness of the space thumbs that you know well !

- Use wisely the "Dodge" !

Material used :
Third person template, Particle Text plugin, Gdc 2019 - Sonniss and the music "Longest Run - Noir Et Blanc Vie" (Royalty Free music)
